data.question: What is the formula for the coordination polymer formed from reaction with compound 3?
What type of structure is formed from the reaction with compound 6?
How does the positioning of carboxylic acid functionality affect the assembly of metal–organic structures?
data.answer: An obtuse angle between the acid functionalities and lower-rim centroid leads to a coordination polymer, while a more acute angle results in discrete metal–organic capsule formation.

data.question: Is the formation of the metal–organic capsule solvent dependent?
What role does 1,10-phenanthroline play in the assembly of the structures?
data.answer: It restricts the coordination sites available around the directing cadmium centres.

data.question: What is the effect of the coordination chemistry on the two unique molecules of compound 3 found in the metal–organic capsule?
data.answer: It results in tilting of the two calixarenes due to coordination of the phen ligands.

data.question: Does the partially pinched-cone conformation of compound 6 change when forming the metal–organic capsule?
What is the yield of the pale yellow solid formed from the synthesis of Di-O-butoxy-di-O-bis(p-nitrobenezenesulfonyloxy)-calix[4]arene, compound 4?
What is the melting point range of the pale yellow solid formed from the synthesis of compound 4?
Is the formation of the coordination polymer from compound 3 dependent on the use of DMF as a solvent?
What is the yield of the pale yellow solid formed from the synthesis of p-di-carboxylato-di-O-butoxy-di-O-bis(p-nitrobenezenesulfonyloxy)-calix[4]arene, compound 5?
What is the melting point of the pale yellow solid formed from the synthesis of compound 5?
What is the yield of the pale yellow solid formed from the synthesis of p-di-carboxylato-di-O-butoxy-calix[4]arene, compound 6?
What is the melting point of the pale yellow solid formed from the synthesis of compound 6?
Does the coordination polymer formed from compound 3 contain interwoven pairs of 1-D chains?
What is the role of cadmium nitrate tetrahydrate in the synthesis of the metal–organic structures?
data.answer: It acts as a directing metal center for the assembly of the structures.

data.question: Is the discrete metal–organic capsule formed from compound 6 symmetrical?
What is the molecular formula of the discrete metal–organic capsule formed from compound 6?
What future work is planned for the new metal–organic capsule?
data.answer: Future work will focus on host–guest solution behaviour of the new capsule and enhanced design of new metal–organic frameworks and polyhedra possessing cavity-containing components.

data.question: Does the coordination polymer formed from compound 3 assemble to form bi-layer type arrays?
